abilities.name: Detonate Dead
about: Explosion deals base Fire Damage equal to 1% of the corpse's Maximum Life

abilities.name: Ethereal Knives
about: Fires an arc of knives in front of the encounter which deals physical damage

abilities.name: Vaal Fire Trap
about: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies
Encounter leaves burning ground behind them
